solution_line_template: The pages she has left to read by Thursday are P + {multiplier_friday}P = {combined_coefficient_P}P = {total_pages_book} - {pages_monday} - {pages_tuesday} - {pages_wednesday} = {pages_remaining_for_thursday_friday} pages.

Therefore, to finish the book on Friday, Cora has to read P = {pages_remaining_for_thursday_friday} / {combined_coefficient_P} = <<{pages_remaining_for_thursday_friday}/{combined_coefficient_P}={pages_on_thursday}>>{pages_on_thursday} pages on Thursday.
